Name: Scuffy Game
About the game: Scuffy Game is a First-Person Multiplayer fan made scuffed version of any platformer games that involves you to be the last one standing. Play different minigames and see who can be the last one standing to and win it all. (Totally not trying to reference a game that copied a TV show from a couple of months ago) Features: Up to 40 players 27 Maps 5 Game Modes Server List Bugs (LOTS OF BUGS) If your still not satisficed with the game, just listen to what some of our costumers have to say! What type of game is this? I give this game a 1/10. - Guy A Picture of Guy I... I mean... this game is good. It's really fun to... play with friends and family. - Also Guy Another Picture of Guy
